This vignette reproduces the simulations in section 3.1. These can take quite a while so it is better to run them
in parallell than sequentially.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
set.seed(5989615)
all.seeds <- floor(runif(n=400, min=1000, max=1e7))

for(beta.type in c("none", "ten_equal", "ten_norm", "mixture")){
    for(i in 1:400){
      run1_linreg_sim(beta.type="none", which.run=i, file.prefix="linreg", seed=all.seeds[i])
    }
}
```
